IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: IDENTIFY NEEDS OF THE ELDERLY AND COORDINATE PROGRAMS AND SERVICES TO MEET THOSE NEEDS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: IDENTIFY NEEDS OF THE ELDERLY, DETERMINE AVAILABLE RESOURCES TO FILL THOSE NEEDS, EVALUATE THEIR EFFECTIVENESS, AND COORDINATE EXISTING PROGRAMS AND SERVICES FOR THE ELDERLY WHEN FEASIBLE.
IRS990.Desc: WE SUBCONTRACT WITH AGENCIES TO PROVIDE MEALS TO OLDER ADULTS IN OKLAHOMA, CLEVELAND, LOGAN, AND CANADIAN COUNTIES. MEALS ARE SERVED AT OLDER AMERICANS ACT MEAL SITES AND INDEPENDANT SENIOR CENTERS. HOME DELIVERED MEALS ARE PROVIDED TO HOME-BOUND ADULTS, 60 YEARS AND OLDER. PARTICIPANTS ARE NOT MEANS TESTED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: WE SERVED CLIENTS WITH SUPPORTIVE SERVICES INCLUDING ADVOCACY, ABUSE PREVENTION, ACCESS TO INFORMATION SERVICES AND OUTREACH. IN ADDITION, SERVICES ARE PROVIDED BY SUBCONTRACTORS TO INDIVIDUALS AGE 60 AND OVER. SERVICES INCLUDE TRANSPORTATION TO MEAL SITES, DOCTORS' OFFICES, GROCERY STORES, POST OFFICES, ETC., HOMEMAKER SERVICES, OUTREACH SERVICES, LEGAL EDUCATION AND LEGAL ASSISTANCE. THESE SERVICES ARE FUNDED THROUGH OLDER AMERICANS ACT TITLE III-B.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: WE SUBCONTRACT WITH AGENCIES TO PROVIDE CAREGIVER SUPPORT SERVICES SUCH AS RESPITE FOR CAREGIVERS, COUNSELING, TRAINING, AND OTHER SUPPORT INCLUDING HELPING GRANDPARENTS RAISING GRANDCHILDREN. THESE ACTIVITIES ARE FUNDED FROM FEDERAL AND STATE OLDER AMERICANS ACT TITLE III-E GRANTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: VARIOUS OTHER PROGRAMS TO BENEFIT SENIOR CITIZENS IN CENTERAL OKLAHOMA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AREAWIDE QUALIFIES AS AN ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND IS SUBJECT TO A TAX ON INCOME FROM ANY UNRELATED BUSINESS, AS DEFINED BY SECTION 509(A)(1) OF THE CODE. AMC AND TG HOUSING ARE SUBJECT TO TAX UNDER IRS RULES; HOWEVER, THESE ENTITIES ARE EXPERIENCING NET OPERATING LOSSES. THEREFORE, NO PROVISION HAS BEEN MADE FOR INCOME TAXES IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. AREAWIDE HAS NOT IDENTIFIED ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2021. FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX STATUTES DICTATE THAT TAX RETURNS FILED IN ANY OF THE PREVIOUS THREE REPORTING PERIODS REMAIN OPEN TO EXAMINATION. CURRENTLY, AREAWIDE HAS NO OPEN EXAMINATIONS WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE OR THE OKLAHOMA TAX COMMISSION.
THE INTENDED USE OF THE ENDOWMENT THROUGH THE OKC COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS TO PROVIDE ONGOING SUPPORT FOR THE PROGRAM AND SERVICES OF AREAWIDE AGING AGENCY.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CITY OF YUKON - DALE ROBERTSON CENTER
EOC TECHNOLOGY CENTER ADULT DAY SERVICE

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SUPPLIES FOR FALL PREVENTION/ DURABLE MEDICAL EQUIPMENT/HOME SAFTEY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OUR GRANTS ARE REIMBURSEMENT-TYPE GRANTS. WE BASE PAYMENT OF THE GRANTS ON SUBMISSION OF MONTHLY EXPENSE REPORTS OR INVOICES. ALSO, FOR OUR OLDER AMERICANS ACT GRANTS, WE REQUIRE MONTHLY PROGRAM INCOME REPORTS, QUARTERLY SUMMARIES OF REVENUE AND EXPENSE, AND AN ANNUAL AUDIT, SUBMITTED WITH THE ANNUAL INVENTORY OF FIXED ASSETS ACQUIRED WITH GRANT FUNDS. UNITS OF SERVICE AND UNDUPLICATED PERSONS SERVED ARE REQUIRED TO BE INPUT ON AN ONLINE DATABASE AT LEAST MONTHLY. WE CONDUCT QUARTERLY ONSITE PROGRAM ASSESSMENTS AND AN ANNUAL ONSITE FINANCIAL ASSESSMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER AS SOON AS AVAILABLE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER IS EXPECTED TO COMPLETE A FORM EACH YEAR INDICATING ANY RELATIONSHIPS WITH THE POTENTIAL TO PRESENT A CONFLICT-OF-INTEREST AND DISCLOSE ANY SUCH INTERESTS AS THEY PERTAIN TO AGENCY BUSINESS ON THE FORM AND AS THEY OCCUR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STAFF SALARIES, INCLUDING THOSE FOR THE CEO AND CFO, ARE SET BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED ON AVAILABLE INFORMATION REGARDING SALARIES FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS. IT IS THE INTENT OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS TO MAKE SALARY ADJUSTMENTS FOR THE STAFF BASED ON MERIT AND WRITTEN EVALUATION, AND THAT ANY INCREASES BE IMPLEMENTED ON THE SAME DATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AREAWIDE AGING AGENCY IS SUBJECT TO THE OPEN MEETING ACT AND THE OPEN RECORDS ACT. OUR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE GENERALLY REVIEWED AT EACH BOARD MEETING. BOARD MEETINGS ARE OPEN TO THE PUBLIC. OUR BY-LAWS AND POLICIES, INCLUDING THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS HAVE NOT CHANGED DURING THE CURRENT TAX YEAR.
